articles.title: Heath Officials Search for Cause of Hepatitis in Children in 16 Countries - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: Over 170 cases of acute severe hepatitis in children aged between 1 month and 16 years have been reported from 16 countries, 12 in Europe
articles.content:
Geneva  Health officials are still trying to identify the cause of cases of acute and severe hepatitis that have infected scores of children in 16 countries, mainly in Europe.
